name: kafka-docker-app
description: A Kafka application using Docker for ClearVue data pipeline

scripts.create:age: docker-compose exec kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server kafka:9092 --create --if-not-exists --topic age_analysis --partitions 1 --replication-factor 1
scripts.create:payments: docker-compose exec kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server kafka:9092 --create --if-not-exists --topic payments --partitions 1 --replication-factor 1
scripts.create:purchases: docker-compose exec kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server kafka:9092 --create --if-not-exists --topic purchases --partitions 1 --replication-factor 1
scripts.create:sales: docker-compose exec kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server kafka:9092 --create --if-not-exists --topic sales_transactions --partitions 1 --replication-factor 1
scripts.create:customer: docker-compose exec kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server kafka:9092 --create --if-not-exists --topic customer --partitions 1 --replication-factor 1
scripts.create:products: docker-compose exec kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server kafka:9092 --create --if-not-exists --topic products --partitions 1 --replication-factor 1
scripts.create:rep: docker-compose exec kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server kafka:9092 --create --if-not-exists --topic representative --partitions 1 --replication-factor 1
scripts.create:suppliers: docker-compose exec kafka kafka-topics --bootstrap-server kafka:9092 --create --if-not-exists --topic suppliers --partitions 1 --replication-factor 1
scripts.create:all: npm run create:age && npm run create:payments && npm run create:purchases && npm run create:sales && npm run create:customer && npm run create:products && npm run create:rep && npm run create:suppliers
